grow_event_type_dragon/3901_1301_0100_10:
You look ready for battle! Well then, let’s see
if you can overcome my challenge!
grow_event_type_dragon/3902_1031_0100_10:
I see a lot of
promising Trainers.
grow_event_type_dragon/3902_1301_0100_10:
You will know what is needed in a Pokémon battle
if you can defeat me!
grow_event_type_dragon/3903_1031_0100_10:
It’s hard to find enough
Trainers with some fight
in them!
grow_event_type_dragon/3903_1301_0100_10:
Bring it on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ll show
you what Kingdra and I are made of!
